t: Amazon Karigar fails to boost sales for India’s handicraft makers - Rest of World
s: December 6, 2024 - Amazon Karigar was launched in India in 2017. The program now has 1.6 million handicraft sellers. Artisans in Kutch, a region with a strong handicrafts tradition, say their sales through Amazon are lackluster. Artisans say the site treats their crafts like any other industrially produced product.
